evidence.text: 2 | 2024-10-07 | Joint MOTION for Provisional Approval and Entry of Consent Decree by United States. (Attachments: # 1 Memorandum in Support of Joint Motion, # 2 Exhibit A - Consent Decree, # 3 Appendices to Exhibit A - Consent Decree, # 4 Proposed Order)(GIVEN, EMILY) (Entered: 10/07/2024)

extracted.value: On 2024-10-07, the United States filed a Joint Motion for Provisional Approval and Entry of Consent Decree, seeking court approval of a consent decree with the City of Durham, supported by a Memorandum in Support and Exhibits.

evidence.text: 10 | 2024-12-19 | Joint MOTION to Stay Case Management Deadlines by UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. Response to Motion due by 1/9/2025 (Attachments: # 1 Text of Proposed Order)(RICH, ROBERT) (Entered: 12/19/2024)

extracted.value: On 2024-12-19, the United States filed a Joint Motion to Stay Case Management Deadlines, requesting a stay of all case deadlines pending resolution of the Consent Decree Motion.

evidence.text: 13 | 2025-01-10 | Consent MOTION to Exceed Word Limitation by UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. Response to Motion due by 1/31/2025 (Attachments: # 1 Text of Proposed Order)(GIVEN, EMILY) (Entered: 01/10/2025)

extracted.value: On 2025-01-10, the United States filed a Consent Motion to Exceed Word Limitation, requesting an increase in the word limit for briefing on the applicability of Ricci v. Destefano to 9,000 words.

evidence.text: 14 | 2025-01-14 | MOTION for Leave to File Amicus Brief and Appear at Argument by American Alliance for Equal Rights. Response to Motion due by 2/4/2025 (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Amicus Brief, # 2 Text of Proposed Order)(DICKEY, GILBERT) (Entered: 01/14/2025)

extracted.value: On 2025-01-14, the American Alliance for Equal Rights filed a Motion for Leave to File Amicus Brief and Appear at Argument, seeking permission to file an amicus brief and participate in arguments.

evidence.text: 21 | 2025-01-15 | MOTION to Seal [If the party filing this motion is not the party claiming confidentiality, the party claiming confidentiality must file a response within 14 days that includes the materials required by L.R. 5.4(c)(3).] by UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. Response to Motion due by 1/29/2025 (Attachments: # 1 Text of Proposed Order)(GIVEN, EMILY) (Entered: 01/15/2025)

extracted.value: On 2025-01-15, the United States filed a Motion to Seal, requesting the sealing of the Brief Regarding Applicability of Ricci v. DeStefano.

evidence.text: 28 | 2025-02-25 | NOTICE of Voluntary Dismissal of case by Plaintiff UNITED STATES OF AMERICA (GIVEN, EMILY) (Entered: 02/25/2025)

extracted.value: On 2025-02-25, the United States filed a Notice of Voluntary Dismissal, dismissing the case without prejudice.

evidence.text: 1 | 2024-10-07 | COMPLAINT against CITY OF DURHAM, NORTH CAROLINA filed by UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. (GIVEN, EMILY) Modified on 10/8/2024 to correct party names. (sh) (Entered: 10/07/2024)

extracted.value: On 2024-10-07, the United States filed the Complaint against the City of Durham, North Carolina, initiating the lawsuit and seeking relief under federal civil rights laws.
